name: NTS Golf
description:
A 2D golf game. Unrealistic as can be? Propably. Fun? Maybe- pretty sure.

Play thru the first five levels and then, maybe try making your own using the Level editor?

Currently features

  • 5  Levels
  • a Level Editor
    • 3 "Your Level" slots
    • Instructions for the use of the editor in the menus "info" section.
  • Highscore system
  • Clock(Don't ask why)

Upcoming features for this propably

  • More usable objects to any given level(Currently only 10 + ball + hole)
  • Sound effects and background music

(Goal is to maybe make a game where people actually share levels with one another :D)

Feel free section:

  • Feel free to play this game
  • Feel free to make levels in it
  • Feel free to comment ideas on how to improve this game. Such as:
    • New object types
    • Gameplay features
  • ...Feel free to report bugs. I'm sure there are some- (pst. pretty sure you can boost yourself thru walls)

Some bugs might be helped if you go back to the menu and then forward again- Do know tho that leaving the gameplay or the editor section to the menu by pressing "esc" destroys your progress in said section. Highscore does not dissappear tho.
